meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>unite</kanji> and <kanji>join</kanji> things together, you get <vocabulary>unification</vocabulary>! This can also mean <vocabulary>integration</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>consolidation</vocabulary>, which are essentially other ways to describe things being united.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Unify them.
